scripts.build: pnpm --filter "@vizij/utils" run build && pnpm -r --filter "!@vizij/utils" run --if-present build
scripts.build:packages: pnpm --filter "@vizij/utils" run build && pnpm --filter "@vizij/render" run build && pnpm --filter "@vizij/animation-react" run build && pnpm --filter "@vizij/node-graph-react" run build && pnpm --filter "@vizij/config" run build && pnpm --filter "@vizij/rig" run build
scripts.build:apps: pnpm --filter vizij-website run build && pnpm --filter vizij-node-graph-editor run build && pnpm --filter demo-animation-studio run build && pnpm --filter demo-animation run build && pnpm --filter demo-graph run build && pnpm --filter demo-render-no-rig run build
scripts.build:animation: pnpm --filter "@vizij/animation-react" run build && pnpm --filter demo-animation-studio run build
scripts.build:graph: pnpm --filter "@vizij/node-graph-react" run build && pnpm --filter vizij-node-graph-editor run build
scripts.link:wasm: pnpm link --global @vizij/animation-wasm && pnpm link --global @vizij/node-graph-wasm && pnpm link --global @vizij/orchestrator-wasm
scripts.reset: node -e "const {execSync}=require('node:child_process'); execSync('rm -rf node_modules'); execSync('find apps -maxdepth 2 -name node_modules -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} +'); execSync('find packages -maxdepth 3 -name node_modules -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} +'); execSync('find . -type d -name .vite -prune -exec rm -rf {} +'); try{execSync('test -f pnpm-lock.yaml');execSync('pnpm install --frozen-lockfile',{stdio:'inherit'});}catch(e){execSync('pnpm install',{stdio:'inherit'})}"
